00039 boost::shared_ptr<Options>
00040 makeRemoteCommandOpt(string pgName,
00041            string& dietConfig,
00042            string& path){
00043 
00044 
00045   boost::shared_ptr<Options> opt=processOpt(pgName, dietConfig);
00046   
00047   opt->add("path,p",
00048       "represents the path of the file",
00049       HIDDEN,
00050       path,1);
00051 
00052   opt->setPosition("path",1);
00053 
00054 
00055   return opt;
00056 }

00066 void ParseRemoteCommandOptions (int argc, char* argv[],std::string& dietConfig, std::string& path){
00067 
00068 // build remote command options
00069 
00070 boost::shared_ptr<Options> opt=processOpt(argv[0], dietConfig);
00071   
00072 opt->add("path,p",
00073       "The file following the pattern [host:]file path.",
00074       HIDDEN,
00075       path,1);
00076   opt->setPosition("path",1);
00077 
00078 bool isEmpty;
00079 GenericCli().processListOpt( opt, isEmpty,argc,argv,"path");
00080 
00081 }

00087 typedef enum{
00088   CREATEFILE,
00089   CREATEDIR,
00090   REMOVEFILE,
00091   REMOVEDIR
00092 } FileActionType;
00093 
00097 template<FileActionType fileActionType>
00098 struct FileActionFunc {
00099 
00103   std::string mpath;
00107   RmFileOptions moptions;
00108 
00113   FileActionFunc(const std::string& path):mpath(path){}
00114 
00120   FileActionFunc(const std::string& path,const RmFileOptions& options):mpath(path),moptions(options){}
00121 
00127   int operator()(std::string sessionKey) {
00128 
00129     int res = -1;
00130     switch(fileActionType) {
00131       case CREATEFILE:
00132         res = createFile(sessionKey,mpath);
00133         break;
00134       case CREATEDIR:
00135         res = createDir(sessionKey,mpath);
00136         break;
00137       case REMOVEFILE:
00138         res = removeFile(sessionKey,mpath,moptions);
00139         break;
00140       case REMOVEDIR:
00141         res = removeDir(sessionKey,mpath);
00142         break;
00143       default:
00144         break;
00145     }
00146 
00147     return res;
00148   }
00149 };
